text: hi my name is Michael and today I'll be
showing how intelligent document
processing can help your organization
make faster and more accurate Decisions
by applying AI to process your paperwork
this video will highlight how AWS AI
helps customers speed up processing a
set of mortgage documents these AI
Technologies are designed to be used
across multiple lending use cases
including Home Equity Auto personal and
Commercial one of the ways AI helps
speed up decisions is recognizing if a
set of documents is complete and has the
necessary information for decision to be
made over time the amount of human help
that is needed to process documents is
reduced as the AI improves let's dive
deeper into the first mortgage so we can
see how the process works documents can
come in from multiple channels including
mailroom emails and portals and in
multiple file formats figuring out what
you have is the first step our AI was
able to classify what types of documents
were received but the first one did not
meet the business rules of AI confidence
scores above 85 percent
let's click on the preview of the first
document in this example the AI
correctly predicted that it was a bank
statement but the confidence score
didn't meet the required level so human
review was required now that the
documents are classified let's go to the
next step looking at the loan
application form the AI is able to read
the key value pair
for example amount equal to 450 000 and
structures the results so that they can
be easily used by your Downstream
Business Systems and database this
technology also works for handwritten
responses and check boxes the AI can
also read documents like this W-2 and
return the key value pairs such as wages
and tax withholding when working with
IDs our AI can normalize field names
even if they are not labeled this makes
it easy to collect information from
state driver's licenses and passports
when looking at documents that include
tables such as bank statements the AI
keeps the headers rows and columns
organized allowing the account name
number and balances to be extracted
accurately this technology can also be
used to extract information from pay
stubs often you only need a few pieces
of information from a document AWS AI
allows you to use natural language
questions to get the key information out
of documents let's ask what the property
address is the AI evaluated the document
and returned ammos lock as the property
address another way to get key
information from dense text documents is
to provide labeled examples of the type
of information you are looking for these
examples help the AI to find the
information such as the closing date and
the letter the business rules you set up
are based on your organization's
requirements in addition to making sure
all the information is included you can
also set up rules that match names wages
or application numbers across documents
after the quality checks are complete
the information from the documents is
ready to be sent to the next step on
your business process
to learn more or to speak with the
document processing specialist please
visit our webpage thank you
